value.title: 3 ways to REDUCE DATA In Power BI Desktop (No Premium needed!)
value.excerpt: Sometimes you want to reduce data in Power BI Desktop so it's easier to work with. Then work with all the data in the Power BI Service. value.title: 9 things to know before getting into Power BI (Or, really anything)
value.excerpt: We share 9 things to know before starting your journey with Power BI. Really this applies to anything... value.title: Best Practice Analyzer in Tabular Editor for your Power BI Dataset
value.excerpt: Do you work on your Power BI dataset or data model? Are you following best practices? Patrick walks you through a best practice analyzer set for Tabular Editor, from Michael Kolvasky, that can help you improve your data model.  Blog post: https://powerbi.microsoft.com/blog/best-practice-rules-to-improve-your-models-performance/

value.title: How to use the Power BI Aggregations Feature
value.excerpt: In this video, Adam sits down with Christian Wade to discuss how to use the Power BI Aggregations feature. Christian Wade on Twitter - @_christianWade  LET'S CONNECT!

value.title: Let's Talk Power BI Gateways

value.title: Native Query: Be careful when using in Power BI
value.excerpt: Patrick looks at native query and why you should be careful when using it in Power BI. He looks at what native query is, what to consider when using it, and how to monitor what query folding, in Power Query, is or is not doing.  Guy in a Cube Courses: https://guyinacu.be/courses  ******** LET'S CONNECT!

value.title: Power BI and the On-premises Data Gateway: What is it?

value.title: Power BI PowerShell and the Admin API
value.excerpt: The Power BI PowerShell and the Admin API allow you to quickly inventory your organization and manage workspaces and access. value.title: The Power BI Smart Narrative visual is INSANE AMAZING!
value.excerpt: The smart narrative visual can help tell the story in your Power BI report. Justyna Lucznik joins us to explore the visual and to illustrate how you can generate text about your data. value.title: Using Images from a Database in Power BI
